titleInfo.title: Photograph of Sugar Cane, Rizat Irrigation System

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: 1 black and white photographDimensions: 86 x 138mm, on sheet 331 x 202mm

mods.abstract: Photograph of sugar cane crops, at the Rizat [RazƒÅt] irrigation system, in Dhofar, Sultanate of Muscat and Oman.This photograph is part of a series of photographs that appear at the end of a preliminary report on the land resources of Dhofar, produced by Brian Joseph Hartley, Director of Agriculture, Aden, and dated 20 March 1948.
